author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two unidentified persons snatched a portion of a gold chain from a 52-year-old woman, M. Shanmugasundari, at Pankajam Colony here in full public view around 11 a.m. on Wednesday. Police said that the woman was returning home from Anuppanadi. When she was walking towards her house in Pankajam Colony from Pandian Nagar bus stand, two persons, who followed her on a motorbike, tried to snatch her seven-sovereign chain.

The woman tightly held the chain. However, a portion of it, weighing around 12 grams, went to the hands of the pillion rider. Teppakulam police are investigating.
title: Chain snatched
